item.title: 7 Best WIRED-Tested Humidifiers for Home and Away (2025)
item.description: Breathe easy with our top WIRED-tested picks for room comfort and preventing illness.

item.title: Satellite Internet Will Let Us Put AI in Everything
item.description: AI-powered agents need to be connected all the time to be truly effective. Sounds like a job for satellite internet providers.

item.title: Low-Cost Drone Add-Ons From China Let Anyone With a Credit Card Turn Toys Into Weapons of War
item.description: Chinese ecommerce giants like Temu and AliExpress sell drone accessories like those used by soldiers in the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
